name: Bizarre Mushroom Cycle Simulator
description:
It's a groundbreaking simulator where you can experience the life of mushrooms. As a mushroom, you can't walk, just peacefully stand in the forest. The forest is perfect for calming your heart.

Varieties

There are over 50 different types of mushrooms. Even if you start alone, the mushrooms will multiply rapidly, and it will soon become lively. Each one has a unique personality. Oh? That mushroom over there seems a bit strange...

Touch

You can collect spores by touching the mushrooms. These spores might come in handy for something. Be careful not to touch them too much, as it weakens the mushrooms.

Relaxation Effect

The sounds of the forest will bring a relaxing effect to you. At night, you can even watch the mushrooms and enchanting fireflies. You can also play music if you like.

Spawn Rate

If you want to spend time with specific mushrooms, you'll be able to change the mushroom's appearance rate after a certain period. Those collected spores might come in handy then?
